name: DeepDive
description:
Oxygen is limited.  Clean up the garbage as much as possible before the oxygen is used up.

====================

Control : 

·Click On Logo : Start Game

·Right Mouse Button : Move

·Left Mouse Button : Attack

·Tab : Change Weapon

·Space : Collect Rubbish

====================

That was my second time joining in the Weekly Game Jam, and I am very excited to complete this game.

Hope you enjoy my game and leave a comment for me so that I can do better.
Thank you!

====================
